body: Yes. It's so that you can both say `@torch.jit.compile` as well as `@torch.jit.compile(nderivs=2)`; people always forget the parens in the no-argument case.
body_html: Yes. It's so that you can both say @torch.jit.compile as well as @torch.jit.compile(nderivs=2); people always forget the parens in the no-argument case.
